name: Prep & Glow Best-Sellers
about: What it is:A limited-edition trio of bestsellers to visibly tighten pores, reduce dark spots, and leave you visibly glowing..Skin Type:Normal, Dry, Combination, and Oily.Skincare Concerns:Dark Spots, Pores, and Dullness.Highlighted Ingredients:- Patented Vine Sap Viniferine: Diminishes and prevents the appearance of dark spots for visibly even-toned skin..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:Reset your skin and reveal radiance with this three-step bestsellers set. The Beauty Elixir mist preps your skin, sets makeup, and leaves your complexion glowing, while the mask visibly tightens pores and refines texture. Finish with the Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum to reduce the appearance of dark spots..This Set Contains:- 3.3 oz/ 100 mL Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist.Clinical Results:Pore Minimizing Instant Detox Mask:.Clean & Planet AwareOur ambitious curation of beauty made without controversial ingredients from brands dedicated to making meaningful environmental commitments, including sustainable ingredients and sourcing, packaging, corporate commitments, and consumer transparency.
ingredients: -Patented Vine Sap Viniferine: Diminishes and prevents the appearance of dark spots for visibly even-toned skin..-Rosemary and Rose Essential Oils: Visibly purify pores, enhance radiance, and leave skin feeling fresh..-Sustainably Sourced Clay: Cleanses away visible impurities and excess sebum while tightening the look of pores...Pore Minimizing Instant Detox Mask:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Kaolin, Bentonite, Glycerin, Acacia Senegal Gum, Xanthan Gum, Benzyl Alcohol, Alcohol, Sodium Dehydroacetate, CI 77491 (Iron Oxides), Citrus Aurantium Bergamia (Bergamot) Fruit Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Limonene, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Linalool, Sodium Citrate, Citric Acid, Dehydroacetic Acid, Coffea Arabica (Coffee) Seed Extract, Coffea Robusta Seed Extract, Carbomer, Cupressus Sempervirens Oil, Salvia Sclarea (Clary) Oil, CI 77499 (Iron Oxides), Commiphora Myrrha Oil, Santalum Album (Sandalwood) Oil, Anthemis Nobilis Flower Oil, Papain, Petroselinum Crispum (Parsley) Seed Oil, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylyl Glycol, Sodium Benzoate, Lactic Acid, Algin, Potassium Sorbate...Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum Vitamin C Alternative:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Cococaprylate/Caprate, Squalane, Palmitoyl Grapevine Shoot Extract, Polyglyceryl-3 Distearate, Bisabolol, Glyceryl Stearate, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Microcrystalline Cellulose, Polyacrylate Crosspolymer-6, Potassium Sorbate, Glyceryl Stearate Citrate, Citric Acid, Sodium Phytate, Sodium Hydroxide, Parfum (Fragrance)...Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist:.Aqua/Water/Eau, Alcohol, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Water, Parfum (Fragrance), Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Oil, Potassium Alum, Glycerin, Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Oil, Commiphora Myrrha Resin Extract, Styrax Tonkinensis Resin Extract, Melissa Officinalis (Balm Mint) Leaf Oil, Citrus Aurantium Amara (Bitter Orange) Flower Oil, Rosa Damascena Flower Oil, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Fruit Extract, Tocopherol, Benzyl Benzoate, Citral, Citronellol, Geraniol, Farnesol, Limonene, Linalool...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.Pore Minimizing Instant Detox Mask:.-Apply a thin layer all over your face and T-zone twice a week..-Leave on for 10 minutes, then rinse with water...Vinoperfect Brightening Dark Spot Serum Vitamin C Alternative:.-Apply in the morning and evening to your face, neck, and decollete...Beauty Elixir Prep, Set, Glow Face Mist:.-Shake before use..-Close your eyes and spritz all over your face from about 12 inches away..-Apply to clean skin to prep and tone before serum..-Use as a makeup-setting spray..-Spritz onto your makeup sponge for a perfect application..-Spritz throughout the day for a quick boost...Recycling Instructions:.-Sustainably designed with zero plastic, made with paper from sustainably managed forests, and printed with plant-based inks, this gift set can be fully recycled (where facilities exist).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Detox mask is super good, the facial toner is so refreshing and wakes up my skin cells. Love the texture and results of serum as skin looks super plumped after using it!
